channel.title: CVE Feed for Senol Sahin -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Senol Sahin -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-37465|2024-07-22T20:28:28.984Z -- senol%20sahin -- gpt3%20ai%20content%20writer
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Senol Sahin GPT3 AI Content Writer allows Stored XSS.This issue affects GPT3 AI Content Writer: from n/a through 1.8.66.

item.title: CVE-2023-51528|2024-06-04T17:20:14.043Z -- senol%20sahin -- ai%20power%3A%20complete%20ai%20pack%20%E2%80%93%20powered%20by%20gpt-4
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Senol Sahin AI Power: Complete AI Pack – Powered by GPT-4.This issue affects AI Power: Complete AI Pack – Powered by GPT-4: from n/a through 1.8.12.

item.title: CVE-2024-37465|2024-07-21T21:24:36.259Z -- senol%20sahin -- gpt3%20ai%20content%20writer
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Senol Sahin GPT3 AI Content Writer allows Stored XSS.This issue affects GPT3 AI Content Writer: from n/a through 1.8.66.
